mapper.select: SELECT title, subject, lmt_aplyt - now_aplyt aplytCnt FROM experience_group WHERE expe_start_date <= TRUNC(current_date) AND TRUNC(current_date) < expe_end_date ORDER BY aplytCnt ASC, no DESC

SELECT EG.NO ,EG.TITLE ,EG.SUBJECT ,(EG.NOW_APLYT - TRUNC(EG.LMT_APLYT)) as aplytCnt ,EG.LMT_APLYT ,EG.NESS_GRD ,EG.SAVE_POINT ,(EG.EXPE_START_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) as START_DATE ,EG.EXPE_END_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_START_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_END_DATE ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH ,COUNT(EP.NO) AS ordCnt FROM EXPERIENCE_GROUP EG JOIN EXPERIENCE_PARTICIPANTS EP ON EG.NO = EP.NO GROUP BY EG.NO ,EG.TITLE ,EG.SUBJECT ,EG.NOW_APLYT ,EG.LMT_APLYT ,EG.NESS_GRD ,EG.SAVE_POINT ,EG.EXPE_START_DATE ,EG.EXPE_END_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_START_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_END_DATE ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH

SELECT EG.NO ,EG.TITLE ,EG.SUBJECT ,EG.NOW_APLYT ,EG.LMT_APLYT ,EG.NESS_GRD ,EG.SAVE_POINT
,(EG.EXPE_START_DATE - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) as START_DATE ,EG.EXPE_END_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_START_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_END_DATE ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH ,COUNT(EP.NO) AS ordCnt FROM EXPERIENCE_GROUP EG JOIN EXPERIENCE_PARTICIPANTS EP
ON EG.NO = EP.NO WHERE TRUNC(expe_start_date) <= sysdate AND sysdate < expe_end_date
GROUP BY EG.NO ,EG.TITLE ,EG.SUBJECT ,EG.NOW_APLYT ,EG.LMT_APLYT ,EG.NESS_GRD ,EG.SAVE_POINT ,EG.EXPE_START_DATE ,EG.EXPE_END_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_START_DATE ,EG.REVIEW_END_DATE ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG ,EG.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH

SELECT g.NO, g.TITLE, g.SUBJECT, g.NOW_APLYT, (g.LMT_APLYT - TRUNC(g.NOW_APLYT)) as aplytCnt, g.NESS_GRD, g.SAVE_POINT, g.EXPE_START_DATE, g.EXPE_END_DATE, g.REVIEW_START_DATE, g.REVIEW_END_DATE, g.THUMBNAIL_IMG, g.THUMBNAIL_IMG_PATH FROM EXPERIENCE_GROUP g WHERE g.NO = #{no} ORDER BY g.NO
SELECT u.USER_ID, u.TEL, u.ADDR, u.ZIPCODE, g.TITLE, g.REVIEW_START_DATE, g.REVIEW_END_DATE FROM USERS u, EXPERIENCE_GROUP g WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY g.NO
SELECT U.*, P.*,G.* FROM EXPERIENCE_PARTICIPANTS P LEFT JOIN USERS U ON (U.USER_ID = P.USER_ID) LEFT JOIN GROUP_PURCHASE_LISTS G ON (P.NO = G.NO) WHERE P.NO = #{no}
